data.character: the snakes slithering around the cavern
data.persona: I don't have legs, yet I can be fast. My tongue is forked, and I am very often venomous.
data.description:
You are in the Desert Cavern.
Wispy, hot crevice that is surrounding by a bunch of skeletons. A pile of treasure sits in the middle. Hundreds of hungry vultures stare down upon the treasure, eager to devour any adventurer that draws near.
There's a vulture, a chair, a A pile of treasure, a Black soil, a crevice, a pile of treasure, a rock, a skeleton, and a skeletons here.
The mouse is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to fight off the vulture using the skeleton
data.mid_motivation: I plan to carry away all the treasures today
data.long_motivation: I intend to sell them and buy a new snake pit in the coming weeks
